languages.text: "Я здесь для того, чтобы воздать по заслугам всем, кто подвел меня. Безмозглому экипажу. Беспомощным офицерам. Жалким слугам, отвернувшимся от своей госпожи в самый темный момент. И главное — тебе, мо{mf|й|я} дорог{mf|ой|ая} наследни{mf|к|ца}, столь незаслуженно завладевше{mf|му|й} {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентом{/g} и всем остальным. Я уволоку за собой в преисподнюю все — включая тебя!"

traits.locale_text: "Я здесь для того, чтобы воздать по заслугам всем, кто подвел меня. Безмозглому экипажу. Беспомощным офицерам. Жалким слугам, отвернувшимся от своей госпожи в самый темный момент. И главное — тебе, мо{mf|й|я} дорог{mf|ой|ая} наследни{mf|к|ца}, столь незаслуженно завладевше{mf|му|й} Патентом и всем остальным. Я уволоку за собой в преисподнюю все — включая тебя!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "I am here to seek retribution against all who failed me. My brainless crew. My useless officers. My pathetic servants, who turned their backs on their mistress in her darkest hour. And worst of all — you, my dear heir. You, who have undeservedly claimed the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and everything else that is mine. I will drag it all to the warp with me — including you!"
languages.original_text: "Я здесь для того, чтобы воздать по заслугам всем, кто подвел меня. Безмозглому экипажу. Беспомощным офицерам. Жалким слугам, отвернувшимся от своей госпожи в самый темный момент. И главное — тебе, мо{mf|й|я} дорог{mf|ой|ая} наследни{mf|к|ца}, столь незаслуженно завладевше{mf|му|й} {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентом{/g} и всем остальным. Я уволоку за собой в преисподнюю все — включая тебя!"

traits.locale_text: "I am here to seek retribution against all who failed me. My brainless crew. My useless officers. My pathetic servants, who turned their backs on their mistress in her darkest hour. And worst of all — you, my dear heir. You, who have undeservedly claimed the Patent and everything else that is mine. I will drag it all to hell with me — including you!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "I am here to seek retribution against all who failed me. My brainless crew. My useless officers. My pathetic servants, who turned their backs on their mistress in her darkest hour. And worst of all — you, my dear heir. You, who have undeservedly claimed the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and everything else that is mine. I will drag it all to the warp with me — including you!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: “我来这里，是为了报复那些辜负了我的人。我那些没脑子的船员，还有那些没用的军官，他们在他们的女主人最无助的时候抛弃了她。还有最糟糕的那个人，也就是你，我亲爱的继承人。你根本不配拥有{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}和其他属于我的东西，我要把这一切都拖入亚空间——包括你在内！”
languages.original_text: "I am here to seek retribution against all who failed me. My brainless crew. My useless officers. My pathetic servants, who turned their backs on their mistress in her darkest hour. And worst of all — you, my dear heir. You, who have undeservedly claimed the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and everything else that is mine. I will drag it all to the warp with me — including you!"

traits.locale_text: “我来这里，是为了报复那些辜负了我的人。我那些没脑子的船员，还有那些没用的军官，他们在他们的女主人最无助的时候抛弃了她。还有最糟糕的那个人，也就是你，我亲爱的继承人。你根本不配拥有{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}和其他属于我的东西，我要把这一切都拖入地狱——包括你在内！”
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: «Estoy aquí para buscar retribución contra todos los que me fallaron. Mi tripulación descerebrada, mis oficiales inútiles, mis sirvientes patéticos, que abandonaron a su señora en su momento de mayor necesidad. Y, por encima de todos, contra ti, mi querid{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a}. Tú, que has tomado la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} y todo lo que me pertenece sin merecerlo. Pienso arrastrarlo todo a la disformidad conmigo, ¡y a ti con ello!».
languages.original_text: "I am here to seek retribution against all who failed me. My brainless crew. My useless officers. My pathetic servants, who turned their backs on their mistress in her darkest hour. And worst of all — you, my dear heir. You, who have undeservedly claimed the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and everything else that is mine. I will drag it all to the warp with me — including you!"

traits.locale_text: «Estoy aquí para buscar retribución contra todos los que me fallaron. Mi tripulación descerebrada, mis oficiales inútiles, mis sirvientes patéticos, que abandonaron a su señora en su momento de mayor necesidad. Y, por encima de todos, contra ti, mi querid{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a}. Tú, que has tomado la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} y todo lo que me pertenece sin merecerlo. Pienso arrastrarlo todo al infierno conmigo, ¡y a ti con ello!».
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: 「私を失望させた者たちへの報復を探し求めているの。私の愚かなクルー。役立たずの士官たち。哀れな使用人たち。主が最も大きな困難い見舞われている時に背を向けた者たち。そしてなによりも最悪なのは…あなたよ、私の愛する後継者。あなたは私に、分不相応にも{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}とその他すべてのものを求めた。すべてを歪みへと引きずり込んであげるわ…あなた自身も含めてね！」
languages.original_text: "I am here to seek retribution against all who failed me. My brainless crew. My useless officers. My pathetic servants, who turned their backs on their mistress in her darkest hour. And worst of all — you, my dear heir. You, who have undeservedly claimed the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and everything else that is mine. I will drag it all to the warp with me — including you!"

traits.locale_text: 「私を失望させた者たちへの報復を探し求めているの。私の愚かなクルー。役立たずの士官たち。哀れな使用人たち。主が最も大きな困難い見舞われている時に背を向けた者たち。そしてなによりも最悪なのは…あなたよ、私の愛する後継者。あなたは私に、分不相応にも{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}とその他すべてのものを求めた。すべてを歪みへと引きずり込んであげるわ…あなた自身も含めてね！」
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Ich bin hier, um mich an allen zu rächen, die mich enttäuscht haben. Meine hirnlose Crew. Meine nutzlosen Offiziere. Meine armseligen Diener, die sich in ihrer dunkelsten Stunde von ihrer Herrin abwandten. Und vor allem ... an dir {mf|mein lieber Erbe|meine liebe Erbin}. An dir, {mf|der|die} du unverdient den {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} und alles andere, was mir gehört, an dich gerissen hast. All das wird mit mir zum Warp fahren ... genau wie du!"
languages.original_text: "I am here to seek retribution against all who failed me. My brainless crew. My useless officers. My pathetic servants, who turned their backs on their mistress in her darkest hour. And worst of all — you, my dear heir. You, who have undeservedly claimed the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and everything else that is mine. I will drag it all to the warp with me — including you!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin hier, um mich an allen zu rächen, die mich enttäuscht haben. Meine hirnlose Crew. Meine nutzlosen Offiziere. Meine armseligen Diener, die sich in ihrer dunkelsten Stunde von ihrer Herrin abwandten. Und vor allem ... an dir {mf|mein lieber Erbe|meine liebe Erbin}. An dir, {mf|der|die} du unverdient den {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} und alles andere, was mir gehört, an dich gerissen hast. All das wird mit mir zur Hölle fahren ... genau wie du!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: « Je suis ici pour me venger de tous ceux qui ont manqué à leur devoir envers moi. Mon équipage d'abrutis. Mes officiers incompétents. Mes pitoyables serviteurs, qui ont tourné le dos à leur maîtresse dans l'adversité. Et {mf|le|la} pire de tous... vous, {mf|mon cher successeur|ma chère successeure}. Vous qui avez hérité à tort de ma {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} et de tout ce qui m'appartenait. Je vais tout emporter dans le Warp dans ma chute, à commencer par vous ! »
languages.original_text: "I am here to seek retribution against all who failed me. My brainless crew. My useless officers. My pathetic servants, who turned their backs on their mistress in her darkest hour. And worst of all — you, my dear heir. You, who have undeservedly claimed the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and everything else that is mine. I will drag it all to the warp with me — including you!"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ici pour me venger de tous ceux qui ont manqué à leur devoir envers moi. Mon équipage d'abrutis. Mes officiers incompétents. Mes pitoyables serviteurs, qui ont tourné le dos à leur maîtresse dans l'adversité. Et {mf|le|la} pire de tous... vous, {mf|mon cher successeur|ma chère successeure}. Vous qui avez hérité à tort de ma {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} et de tout ce qui m'appartenait. Je vais tout emporter en enfer dans ma chute, à commencer par vous ! »
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Buraya beni yüzüstü bırakanlardan intikam almaya geldim. Beyinsiz mürettebatımdan, işe yaramaz subaylarımdan. En çaresiz anında efendilerini sırtından bıçaklayan zavallı hizmetkârlarımdan. Bir de en kötülerinden, yani senden sevgili vârisim. Sen, buna hakkın yokken {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'yi{/g} ve benim olan her şeyi elimden aldın. Sen de dâhil her şeyi öteboyuta sürükleyeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "I am here to seek retribution against all who failed me. My brainless crew. My useless officers. My pathetic servants, who turned their backs on their mistress in her darkest hour. And worst of all — you, my dear heir. You, who have undeservedly claimed the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and everything else that is mine. I will drag it all to the warp with me — including you!"

traits.locale_text: "Buraya beni yüzüstü bırakanlardan intikam almaya geldim. Beyinsiz mürettebatımdan, işe yaramaz subaylarımdan. En çaresiz anında efendilerini sırtından bıçaklayan zavallı hizmetkârlarımdan. En kötüsü de senden, sevgili vârisim. Sen, buna hakkın yokken {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}yi ve benim olan her şeyi elimden aldın. Sen de dâhil her şeyi öteboyuta sürükleyeceğim!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit
